title: C. Claire Embroidery Personalized Tooth Fairy Pillow for Boys (Red with Stripes)
features: A Classic Personalized Tooth Fairy Pillow for a Boy. Makes a great Keepsake
Each Pillow has a pocket just the perfect size to fit a tooth and the gift that the tooth fairy leaves behind
Pillow can be personalized with a name up to 10 characters
Dimensions: 12"X12". Each Pillow has an envelope back and comes with a pillow insert
IMPORTANT- Click the Customize Now button to begin your order.
description: A Personalized Tooth Fairy Pillow makes a perfect gift for that special boy about to loose his teeth. What a great place to put it to wait and see what the tooth fairy will bring.
